description.zh-CN: 小点搭配发光效果和随机浮动的粒子。生成动态粒子效果、互动视觉系统和流动粒子美学。小点搭配光晕和随机漂浮效果。生成动态粒子系统和交互粒子。
description.en-US: Small dots with glow effects and random floating creating particle system visuals Generates dynamic, organic motion through floating particles, light trails, and swarm-like behavioral patterns for immersive animated visual experiences Creates dynamic particle system effects and animations Perfect for background effects, interactive experiences, and motion design This design approach offers a distinctive visual language suitable for modern applications. It combines aesthetic principles with functional design elements to create compelling user experiences. dynamic motion and interactive particle systems. Excellence in design.
